title: Byron Metcalf - A Warning from The Elders [FLAC]
description:
Sonic Journeys for Healing the Earth

In this 2007 solo project, award-winning instrumental recording artist Byron Metcalf expands his sonic explorations of the shamanic path of soul-based and heart-centered living that is the foundation of his work. Inspired and driven by his increasing frustration related to our current global and planetary challenges, A WARNING FROM THE ELDERS invites the listener to whole-heartedly embrace the urgency facing the planet, while also birthing the dormant seeds of hope and vision that lie within each of us.
